DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample blood laboratory patient receive erlotinib hydrochloride may help doctor learn effect erlotinib hydrochloride cell . It may also help doctor understand well patient respond treatment . DOC.brief_title: Biomarkers Predicting Response Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Previously Treated With Erlotinib Hydrochloride
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To evaluate whether serum NGAL , MMP-9 , NGAL/MMP-9 complex , soluble E-cadherin utilized biomarkers predict response patient non-small cell lung cancer treat erlotinib hydrochloride . OUTLINE : Serum sample analyze NGAL , MMP-9 , NGAL/MMP-9 , soluble E-cadherin ELISA Luminex assay .
